nodes.text: The Odacer-Faustin academy library was a massive building on the grounds of the Sith academy on Odacer-Faustin. The structure was built by the Sith Lord Darth Drear, and housed a Sith Temple within its lowest reaches. After Drear's death, the Neti librarian Dail'Liss adopted responsibility for the library, protecting its secrets and hoarding its treasures.
